description.value: Your thoughts and instincts are clouded. Stupefied always includes a value. You take a status penalty equal to this value on Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based checks and DCs, including Will saving throws, spell attack modifiers, spell DCs, and skill checks that use these attribute modifiers. Any time you attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell] while stupefied, the spell is disrupted unless you succeed at a @Check[type:flat|showDC:all|dc:resolve(5+@item.badge.value)] with a DC equal to 5 + your stupefied value.
